abstract: Investors worried about the economic downturn have sold technology stocks almost indiscriminately.
snippet: Investors worried about the economic downturn have sold technology stocks almost indiscriminately.
lead_paragraph: Investors worried about the economic downturn have sold technology stocks almost indiscriminately. They haven’t given leading companies like Microsoft, Apple or Google enough credit for their conservative balance sheets, which make their stocks look downright cheap.

headline.main: Lack of Respect for Tech Giants
headline.print_headline: Lack of Respect for Tech Giants

byline.original: By Robert Cyran and Martin Hutchinson
